item.title: messaging fix
item.description:
messaging fix by SBB :
Fixing a XML messaging issue with Netgear MR814v2 devices. Thanks to Smyers.

item.title: messaging fix
item.description:
messaging fix by SBB :
Fixing a missing Host HTTP header field in requests sent to UPNP devices creating an issue with Windows XP FCS. Thanks to Malcolm.

item.title: api update
item.description:
api update by SBB :
Minor improvements to the InternetGatewayDevice and Discovery class API to allows to lookup devices for a particular network interface.

item.title: messaging update
item.description:
messaging update by SBB :
Improving the API to easily retreive a state variable value on the UPNP device and new convenience methods added to set action message input parameters.

item.title: data types fix
item.description:
data types fix by SBB :
Bug fix with ISO 8601 dates parsing, and support added for this date format as action message input parameter.

item.title: JMX fix
item.description:
JMX fix by SBB :
Fixing an issue with boolean type conversion for action message input params from a JMX UPNPServiceMBean call. Thanks to Goyzer.

item.title: eventing update
item.description:
eventing update by SBB :
Improving the API for service events subscription Thanks to Wowplayer.

item.title: eventing fix
item.description:
eventing fix by SBB :
Fixing a bug with services events notifications when device IP is changing. Thanks to Wowplayer.

item.title: messaging fix
item.description:
messaging fix by SBB :
Fixing an issue with XML messages parsing returned by Netgear WGR614 UPNP devices. Thanks to Nielm.
